amendment.purpose: An amendment to include any regulation proposed or issued in connection with ensuring the collection of taxes from a subsidiary of a foreign company doing business in the United States as being exempt from the Regulatory Impact Analysis provisions of the bill.

action.text: Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Traficant to the Gekas amendment (A006).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Traficant amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
